be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user.HomeController

  • public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Home Controller class that handles actions in the Home UI, such as adding or deletion of tabs.

      • close

        public static void close(javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
        Enable primordial tabs when the new tab is closed. Once the tab is closed, goes back to the Home tab.
        Parameters:
        tab - the tab to close
